name: Samsung Gravity Touch T669 (Gently Used) SOLD
description:
Samsung - Gravity T Mobile Phone - Steel (T-Mobile)

Model: t669 | SKU: 9976292

Product Features
Built-in 2.0MP digital camera with flash
Lets you take still photos.
Built-in Bluetooth compatibility
For wireless communication with a Bluetooth-enabled device.
Built-in music player
Lets you listen to your favorite tunes on the go.
Text and video messaging
Lets you communicate by typing and sending videos. The slide-out, full QWERTY keyboard makes typing easy. Internet and e-mail access help you stay in touch online.
Multiple networks
Operates on GSM 850/900/1800/1900MHz and UMTS 1700/2100MHz networks so you can access the Web.
Touch-screen display
For easy navigation of features.
Customizable polyphonic ringtones
Allow you to personalize the sound of your phone. Vibrate mode notifies you discreetly of incoming phone calls and messages.
Speed dial
Lets you call frequently used numbers with the touch of a button. 2,000-entry phone book lets you store your contact numbers. Hands-free speakerphone lets you talk while driving.
Embedded A-GPS chip
Allows access to E911 emergency location services where available.
microSD card slot
Lets you easily store and transfer data (media card not included).
Up to 6 hours talk time and 12.5 days standby
With included lithium-ion battery.
